newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: India tenders to buy kerosene for May delivery.
newsitem.headline: India tenders to buy kerosene for May delivery.

text.p: State-owned Indian Oil Corp (IOC) has issued a tender to buy superior kerosene oil for May delivery, traders said on Friday.
The tender seeks 40,000-to-45,000-tonne cargoes for delivery to Madras or Haldia on the Indian east coast, cost-and-freight (c-and-f) basis.
The tender closes on April 3 and offers will be valid until 2200 hours, India time on April 4.
In its last tender, IOC bought a 40,000-to-45,000-tonne cargo of kerosene for April delivery from Total SA at a premium of $33.40 per tonne to Mediterranean spot quotes, c-and-f Madras or Haldia.
